General.Name: Xi S And D Inc
General.Description: Xi S&D Inc. engages in housing construction, building construction, home network installation, information and communication construction, housing management, and electronic security works. The company was formerly known as Easyville Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xi S&D Inc. in February 2018. Xi S&D Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
